paper_abstract: In this paper, we give characterizations of the classical generalized quadrangles H(3, q (2)) and H(4, q (2)), embedded in PG(3, q (2)) and PG(4, q (2)), respectively. The intersection numbers with lines and planes characterize H(3, q (2)), and H(4, q (2)) is characterized by its intersection numbers with planes and solids. This result is then extended to characterize all Hermitian varieties in dimension at least 4 by their intersection numbers with planes and solids.
paper_title: Characterizations of Hermitian varieties by intersection numbers
